attributes.action: Stop the UK Government's Attempt to Dim the Sun
attributes.additional_details: Investing the £50 million earmarked for dimming the sun into schools and healthcare would directly benefit citizens. This amount could fund the construction of five new hospitals, improving healthcare access and services. It could also enhance educational facilities and hire more teachers, leading to a healthier, better-educated population.
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, are concerned about the government's proposal to dim the sun to combat climate change. We believe this could have harmful environmental, health, and agricultural impacts. We demand transparency, public consultation, and exploration of safer alternatives.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Make all forms of 'geo-engineering' affecting the environment illegal
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701963
